name: Abstratct Printed Scarf
description: Soft fabric, vibrant prints, versatile styling options.

name: Athletic Mesh Slip-On Sneakers
description: Breathable mesh, elasticized fit, perfect for workouts or casual wear.

name: Backpacks
description: A compact and versatile backpack, perfect for everyday use or carrying light essentials. Daypacks typically range from 15 to 25 liters in capacity.

name: Baseball caps
description: Baseball caps can be dressed up or down and can be worn with a variety of outfits.

name: Belts
description: A timeless classic, leather belts come in various finishes like smooth, textured, or pebbled. They exude sophistication and can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion.

name: Boxy Tailored Jacket
description: Our wool-blend coat is a winter essential, providing both warmth and style with its tailored silhouette and faux-fur collar.

name: Casual Sandals
description: Sleek design, single strap, effortlessly stylish.

name: Casual Strappy Flat Sandals
description: Faux leather, metallic accents, customizable comfort for summer chic.

name: Chelsea Boots
description: An elegant and practical boot style with elasticated side panels for easy on and off.  Suitable for colder weather and can be dressed up or down.

name: Chic Suede Ankle Boots
description: Premium suede, sleek design, versatile elegance for any occasion.

name: City Commuter Coat
description: Embrace timeless style with our cotton-blend trench coat. This lightweight yet durable outer layer offers classic sophistication with modern comfort.

name: City Essentials Blazer
description: Elevate your style with our refined yet casual corduroy blazer. Crafted from premium cotton with a touch of stretch, this garment offers lasting comfort and shape retention.

name: Classic Leather Crossbody Bag
description: High-quality leather, multiple compartments, versatile style.

name: Cotton Short Sleeve Dress
description: Exude timeless elegance in our classic little rose dress, featuring a tasteful knee-length hem and a tailored silhouette.

name: Derby Shoes
description: Similar to Oxfords but with open lacing, offering more flexibility and a slightly less formal look. Great for work or dressed-up casual wear.

name: Duke Overcoat
description: Embrace sophisticated style with our timeless wool overcoat. This premium garment exudes luxury with its rich fabric and impeccable tailoring.

name: Fashionable High-Top Canvas Sneakers
description: Durable canvas, trendy high-top style, urban flair for any outfit.

name: Fleece Turtleneck Long Sleeve Dress
description: Elevate your winter style with our cozy flannel shirt, perfect for casual outings or fireside gatherings.

name: Heritage Duffle
description: Experience classic style with this traditional duffle coat, perfect for braving cooler weather.

name: Hoop Earrings
description: Classic hoops, timeless elegance, versatile style.

name: Icon Denim Trucker
description: Channel effortless cool with our versatile denim jacket. This timeless piece adds a touch of edge to any outfit, making it a wardrobe staple for all seasons.

name: Iconic Tee
description: Embrace casual sophistication with our premium cotton crewneck tee. Tailored for a modern, streamlined fit, this wardrobe staple pairs perfectly with your favorite denim or chinos.

name: Linen Blend Shirt
description: floral-print midi dress effortlessly combines style and comfort, making it a versatile choice for any occasion.

name: Loafers
description: Versatile slip-on shoes with a moccasin construction. Available in various materials like leather and suede, ideal for smart casual settings.

name: Maverick Bomber
description: Make a statement with our edgy bomber jacket.  This iconic design features ribbed cuffs and hem, offering a timeless and effortlessly cool look.

name: Minimalist Layered Necklace
description: Delicate chains, dainty pendants, effortlessly chic.

name: Oxford Shoes
description: A timeless dress shoe characterized by closed lacing and a low heel. Perfect for formal occasions and work environments.

name: Pleated Camisole Dress (Floral)
description: Slim-fit denim shirt features a stylish button-down collar and versatile dark wash.

name: Premium Linen Long Sleeve Shirt (Striped)
description: Step into summer with our lightweight linen shirt, offering a breezy and relaxed fit for warm-weather occasions.

name: Rayon Long Sleeve Blouse
description: Stay on-trend with our polka dots-printed shirt, adding a pop of color and personality to your ensemble.

name: Relaxed Tailored Jacket
description: Transition seamlessly between seasons with our lightweight, water-resistant raincoat, featuring a packable design for on-the-go convenience.

name: Smooth Stretch Cotton Crew Neck Long Sleeve T-Shirt
description: Experience ultimate comfort with our wrinkle-resistant, moisture-wicking shirt, ideal for long days at the office.

name: Smooth Stretch Cotton Crew Neck Long Sleeve T-Shirt
description: Elevate your winter style with our cozy flannel shirt, perfect for casual outings or fireside gatherings.

name: Sneakers
description: A footwear staple offering comfort and style.  From classic low-top styles to trendy high-tops, there's a sneaker for every occasion.

name: Sunglasses
description: Originally designed for pilots, they became popularized by celebrities and have remained a fashion staple ever since.

name: The Rebel Rider
description: Exude edgy confidence with our classic leather biker jacket. Crafted from premium cowhide, this jacket combines rebellious attitude with timeless style.

name: The Winter Rebel Parka
description: Crafted from a warm yet lightweight wool-blend fabric, this versatile coat features a high collar to block chilly winds and a full-length zipper for easy layering.

name: Urban Utility Jacket
description: This versatile jacket boasts multiple pockets for functionality and a timeless design that transitions seamlessly from work to weekend wear.

name: Vintage Round Sunglasses
description: Retro round frame, tinted lenses, UV protection.

name: Watches
description: A great choice for the active man.  Sport watches are typically made from durable materials, are water-resistant, and often have special features like timers, alarms, compasses, etc.
